metadata.feature_description: Shows server information and system status in a hover-based summary panel.

steps.action: Navigated to home page and logged in as superuser
steps.expected: Successfully logged in with PersonaBar visible
steps.actual: Successfully logged in with PersonaBar visible on left side showing menu items

steps.action: Hovered over the Evoq logo at the top of the PersonaBar
steps.expected: Server summary panel should appear with server information
steps.actual: Server summary panel appeared showing product name, version, .NET framework, server name, license key, and links to Documentation, Customer Portal, Contact Support, and Logout

steps.action: Examined the server summary panel content while hovering over logo
steps.expected: All server metrics should display correctly with accurate information
steps.actual: Server summary displayed: Product Name: EVOQ ENGAGE, Version: v. 10.01.01 (87), .NET Framework: 4.8, Server Name: EC2AMAZ-2AKAC3I, License Key: Trial. All metrics displayed correctly with proper labels.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify summary dismissal on mouse leave

steps.action: Moved mouse away from the PersonaBar logo to the main content area
steps.expected: Server summary panel should be dismissed
steps.actual: Server summary panel was dismissed and the normal view returned, showing the full main content area without the summary overlay

steps.action: Re-hovered over the Evoq logo after the panel was dismissed
steps.expected: Server summary panel should appear again with the same information
steps.actual: Server summary panel reappeared with the same server information, demonstrating the hover-based display works consistently

observations: The server summary panel uses the hoverIntent jQuery plugin with a 200ms timeout for smooth interaction
The panel includes links to external DNN resources (Documentation, Customer Portal, Contact Support)
The Logout button is also included in the server summary panel for quick access
Server information is fetched via an API call to GetServerInfo endpoint
The panel displays dynamically based on visibility settings (DocCenterVisible, CustomerPortalVisible, ContactSupportVisible)
